name: Belyi Tsar
desc: Tsar of all fae and the first Cryo Archon.

customize.name: Fae
customize.desc: Followers of the first Cryo Archon, the Belyi Tsar, who were created from the bones of giant beasts and fallen frostmoon light.

customize.text: The Belyi Tsar was the ruler of the fae, creatures created from the frostmoon light and bones of the giant beasts. Most of the fae were killed by the

customize.name: Primordial One
customize.desc: The First Descender, who defeated seven Dragon Sovereigns of the world and created people. The Primordial One may be Phanes.

customize.text:
around 6,000 years ago, and the survivors followed Belyi Tsar. The fae are the nobility of Snezhnaya. Although their glory is in the past, they continue to influence the nation.
Snezhnaya
The Belyi Tsar was the first Cryo Archon.

customize.name: Nod-Krai
customize.desc:
The moon-blessed land located in the northwestern regions of Teyvat.

Follow the silver thread spun by the new moon, traverse biting gales and desolate tundras as the snow-kissed lakes, fractured like mirrors, reflect their ageless, glacial radiance. The days are bitterly short, and the night stretches on like a dark, yawning maw. But even then, the light and song of the Welkin Moon will dance gently across the faces of visiting travelers. Up at ye towers, and let your lanterns blaze into the darkness! Until the day comes... when true moonlight bathes this land once more.

customize.text: More than 500 years ago, the Belyi Tsar ordered the exploration and development of these borderlands.

customize.name: Rotwang
customize.desc: A "mad monk,' exiled from Khaenri'ah, who dreamt of the pitch-black Elysium. His real name is Rauthvangi.

customize.text: for studying the forbidden dark knowledge. Rotwang knew that the Belyi Tsar was hatching a bold scheme, a revolt that the sublunary order could never tolerate, but he believed that the Belyi Tsar should think bigger.
The Belyi Tsar's successor, who became the Cryo Archon after his death during the

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.
